<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeSDFToScreenUV"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeSDFToScreenUV

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A function to convert an SDF (signed-distance field) to screen UV, to be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Translates to ``sdf_to_screen_uv(sdf_pos)`` in the shader language.
